description.value: A ValueSet to identify codes representing Adjustments required for a patient

display.value: Uses personal audio recording device to record information
Uses telecommunications device for the deaf
Uses a non-speech system for communication
Uses voice amplifier to support communication
Visual frame sign language interpreter needed
Requires contact by short message service text message
Requires healthcare information recording on personal audio recording device
Requires information in electronic audio format
Requires information in electronic downloadable format
Requires information on audio cassette tape
Requires information on digital versatile disc
Requires third party to read out written information
Requires written information in at least 20 point sans serif font
Requires written information in at least 24 point sans serif font
Requires written information in at least 28 point sans serif font
Uses apps on mobile device to support communication
Difficulty processing information at normal speed
Requires carer to be present at encounters
Has appointed person with personal welfare lasting power of attorney (Mental Capacity Act 2005)
Needs assistance with medication regimen adherence
Self care deficit for medication management
Needs assistance with medication regimen adherence
Requires reasonable adjustments for health and care access (Equality Act 2010)
